articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits May 11 Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits May 11 Factory
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited May 11 Factory.
					 Kim Jong Un looked round different places of the factory including assembling shop.
					
					 He learned in detail about the performance, quality and packing of "Arirang" hand phone being made at this factory.
					
					 He highly appreciated the creative ingenuity and patriotic enthusiasm with which the officials and employees of the factory laid a solid foundation for mass-producing hand phones by building a new modern hand phone production process.
					
					 He praised them for developing an application program in Korean style which provides the best convenience to the users while strictly guaranteeing security.
					
					 After learning about the performance of a touch hand phone, he said that a hand phone is convenient for its user when that part of the phone is sensitive.
					
					 He noted that these hand phones will be very convenient for their users as their camera function has high pixels.
					
					 After being told that "Arirang" hand phones which the factory started producing a few days ago are high in demand among people, he said he was also pleased as they are liked by people.
					
					 Looking at the trademark "Arirang" inscribed on the hand phone, he noted that mass-production of goods with DPRK trademark can instill national pride and self-respect into the Korean people.
					
					 How nice to see hand phones being successfully produced with indigenous technology, he said, adding it is of educational significance in making people love Korean things.
					
					 He said that only when the quality of products is improved while boosting their production, people will like home-made things and they will be in high demand.
					
					 He advanced tasks to be fulfilled by the factory.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Jae Il and Kim Pyong Ho.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Chadian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Chadian President
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Idriss Deby Itno, president of the Republic of Chad, on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president and people of Chad success in their efforts to achieve the stability of the country and its economic development and expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Visits Ski Resort on Masik Pass
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Visits Ski Resort on Masik Pass
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the  General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, made a field survey of the construction of the ski resort on Masik Pass.
					 Soldier-builders have put into good order the ski courses they had already explored through dynamic efforts to create the "speed on Masik Pass", the new speed of one-match-for-a hundred in the 21st century, and finished the frame assembling of structures including hotel and service building in a short span of time in hearty response to the historic appeal of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Going round various places of the construction site, Choe acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the overall project and encouraged the soldier-builders who opened a prospect for completing the construction of the ski resort within this year.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un initiated the construction of the world's best ski resort and entrusted the task to the People's Army, Choe said, instructing it not to slacken even a bit the spirit of an all-out charge for building an economic power and a high civilized socialist country.
					
					 He underscored the need to push transport of cement, structural steel and gravel ahead of construction and widely introduce rational construction methods to finish the construction of the rest houses as early as possible.
					
					 A consultative meeting took place on the spot. It discussed matters of pressing ahead with the work required by each process in a three dimensional manner and took measures to do so.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for Africa
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for Africa
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun left here Saturday to visit African countries.

articles.title: 3rd Rason International Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
3rd Rason International Trade Fair to Be Held
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The 3rd Rason International Trade Fair is to be held in Rason City from August 19 to 23.
					 To be exhibited there are electrical and electronic products, vehicles, light industrial goods, medicines and other products from companies of various countries and regions, including the DPRK, China, Russia, Germany, Australia, Japan and China's Taipei.
					
					 The fair will contribute to developing cooperation and exchange among countries and regions in trade, economy and science and technology.

articles.title: 4th National Workshop on Agroforestry Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
4th National Workshop on Agroforestry Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Workshop on Agroforestry took place here from August 6 to 8. 
					 The workshop, sponsored by the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection with cooperation of the Swiss Cooperation Office in the DPRK, was attended by related officials from the ministries and national institutions, teachers and researchers.
					
					 Present there were representatives of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), the European Union Programme Support, the East Asian Office of the World Agroforestry Center and the Swiss Cooperation Office here.  
					
					 Ri Song Il, a department director of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, said in his speech that the DPRK Government set the agroforestry management as an important economic strategy and established legal and mechanical systems, thus paving a way for carrying on the management on a nationwide scale.
					
					 He elaborated on the achievements gained in the management in Suan County, North Hwanghae Province and other parts of the country, with cooperation of international agencies and several foreign countries.
					
					 Martin Weiersmuller, representative of the Swiss Cooperation Office here, said in his speech that the 4th National Workshop on Agroforestry would serve as an occasion for sharing experience gained by the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and his office in some 100 trial sites and attaining a legal framework for expanding the management.
					
					 The floor was also taken by the representative and experts of the East Asian Office of the World Agroforestry Center and representatives of the FAO and the European Union Programme Support.
					
					 The speakers said the agroforestry management played an important role in improving the people's livelihood and restoring mountains' scenery.
					
					They referred to the ways for preventing land degradation in the management sites and exchanged experience and views they obtained in carrying on the management.
					
					 The workshop discussed a draft national strategy for developing the agroforestry management in the DPRK.
					
					 Participants in the workshop visited the township of Suan County, North Hwanghae Province, where the management is gaining momentum on a trial basis.

articles.title: New Production Process of Fermented Feed Built at Pig Farm
articles.content:
New Production Process of Fermented Feed Built at Pig Farm
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A comprehensive production process for fermented feed and additives was built at the Pyongyang Pig Farm. 
					 Officials and technicians of the farm settled technological issues by joining creative wisdom with teachers and researchers of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University and the State Bacilli-Culture Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and thus opened a prospect for industrializing the production of fermented feed. 
					
					 The new production method of fermented feed and additives has been already introduced into the farm to prove its economic efficiency. 
					
					 The fermented feed produced by use of nutritive additives help reduce the rate of grain consumption 30 percent by promoting digestion and increase the rate of pig weight 1.2 times as it contains ferments and vitamins.

articles.title: Rakdong River Turns into River of Death
articles.content:
Rakdong River Turns into River of Death
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Rakdong River has turned into the river of death due to the project of the four large rivers undertaken by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. 
					 The people's team for investigation into the project of the four large rivers together with lawmakers from opposition parties and members of environmental organizations made field survey of the Rakdong River on August 7 and deplored that the river has turned into one where living organism cannot live and which inflict only sufferings upon people. 
					
					 Now the river has been seriously contaminated due to the massive existence of weed. 
					
					 It has grown so thick that the river cannot admit sunrays and reduces oxygen in the water, threatening the existence of fish and selfish.
					
					 Ecological environment on the riverside is serious.
					
					 Eight dams built as part of the project for the four large rivers are overgrown with weeds and trees there are dying.
					
					 What matters is that the dams are in such bad shape that they may collapse any moment.
					
					 The bottoms of the dams are sinking without let-up in various points as they were designed on the basis of a wrong calculation of flux of river water and its speed and pressure. Consequently, water is leaking from one place of two water gates of one dam. A project for repairing dams is now under way, requiring spending of a stupendous amount of money collected from the people as taxes.
					
					 Looking at the Rakdong River, a dead river, people from all walks of life demand: "Let river water flow again as its trend was stemmed." "The present regime which promised the ecological restoration of the Rakdong River should own responsibility and take measures as early as possible. Otherwise, it will not be able to evade the same responsibility as the Lee Myung Bak regime's".

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Woman Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Woman Centenarian
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Rim Son Bi congratulating her 100th birthday. She resides in Pongo-ri, Kangryong County, South Hwanghae Province. 
					 Overwhelmed with emotion, she extended profound thanks to Kim Jong Un for the birthday spread.
					
					 She was subject to all sorts of maltreatment and contempt as a member of a stateless nation. She had hard living in south Korea even after the liberation of the country.  
					
					 She could lead a worthy life, doing farming, only after she came under the care of the DPRK at the end of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 She worked hard to increase the agricultural production to live up to the benevolence of the party and the leader even a bit till she went beyond the age of pension.
					
					 She is still in good health thanks to the socialist healthcare system.  She keeps herself busy cooking, doing needlework and tending a family garden.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Mending North-South Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Mending North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- It is the unanimous aspiration and will of all Koreans to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity by their concerted efforts, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 Improving the inter-Korean relations is a primary requirement in reunifying the country, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The destiny of the nation and the prospect of reunification hinge on the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group deteriorated the inter-Korean relations. To mend these ties to swim with the trend of the times and meet the aspiration of all Koreans is the task whose implementation brooks no further delay.
					
					 In order to mend the inter-Korean relations, it is necessary to hold high the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 In order to improve the relations in the idea of "By our nation itself" it is imperative to thoroughly preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Whether one respects and implements these declarations or not is a touchstone judging whether one stands for the improvement of inter-Korean relations and national reunification. It is nonsensical to talk about improved inter-Korean relations while turning away from the inter-Korean declarations. Doing so only proves that one opposes dialogue and improvement of inter-Korean relations and seeks confrontation and division.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should wage a dynamic struggle to improve the inter-Korean relations under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" and thus certainly open an epochal phase of national reunification this year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Base Nature of US as Kingpin of Plot-Breeding
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Base Nature of U.S. as Kingpin of Plot-Breeding
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has become vocal about potential attacks by Al Qaeda in August and threats existing in Mideast and North Africa. The White House and the U.S. State Department are busying shutting down U.S. embassies and consulates general in 21 places and issuing travel warnings for those places to Americans.
					 Claiming that it obtained confidential information that terrorist organizations are moving to attack not only the U.S. but its allies and that this is not just a talk for diversion, the U.S. is going to draw its allies into its racket.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a crafty scheme to justify the illegal wire-tapping by the U.S. intelligence organization that has drawn worldwide criticism.
					
					 The U.S. is mired in a bottomless abyss due to the Snowden issue, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 What astonished the world was that the U.S. dark tentacles of espionage had been stretched even to its allies.
					
					 The Snowden case fully revealed that the U.S. is, indeed, the most despicable and heinous country in the world which leaves no means and methods untried to meet its base aim.
					
					 The Snowden case which is increasingly making big splashes worldwide is closely linked with the above-said racket.
					
					 In order to tide over the Snowden case the U.S. needed a shocking case.
					
					 With no plot can the U.S. conceal its true colors as the world's worst criminal state keen on aggression and domination and a rogue state disregarding international law.

articles.title: Minju Joson Exposes Danger of US Cyber Attack Strategy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Exposes Danger of U.S. Cyber Attack Strategy
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign media cited the data disclosed by U.S. ex-CIA contractor Edward Snowden to expose that last year the U.S. president gave instructions to the top government officials and heads of intelligence organizations to set the target of cyber attack within six months. 
					 This shows that the U.S. regards internet as the "fifth battle space" after ground, sea, sky and outer space and prepares for a total war to hold military supremacy in it, Minju Joson Saturday says in a commentary.
					
					 The U.S. cyber attack strategy is a big crime in view of its unjust objective and likely consequences, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 In the top-secret document "PPD 20" the U.S. termed the cyber attack an indispensable capability to restrain and overthrow the enemy doing harm to the U.S. interests in times of peace and war.
					
					 This means that the U.S. is ready to mount a fierce cyber attack on anyone going against the grain with it any moment.
					
					 The cyber attack in internet network may bring irrevocable financial and material damage to the opponent side in a moment. 
					
					 This is nothing but an open threat to mankind and the declaration of the cyber war. 
					
					 The U.S. move can never be justified as it is aimed to make the internet network, which should contribute to civilization and development of mankind, a tool for implementing its strategy for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. has to stop at once the anachronistic acts stemming the advance of mankind to peace, prosperity and development.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Persons Demand Reform of IS
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Persons Demand Reform of IS
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- 1 954 media persons of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Thursday and published a declaration on the situation as regards the case of the puppet Intelligence Service's (IS) illegal interference in the election, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The declaration charged that the violation of democracy, law and order by the IS is being shoved aside by free-for-all in political camp and due to negligence by media.
					
					 It urged the political camp to fundamentally reform the IS, not committing more crime against the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Accused of Arresting Probe into IS
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Accused of Arresting Probe into IS
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Members of the Chunchon Situation Council made up of civic and public organizations including the Chunchon Citizens Solidarity called at Kim Jin Thae, lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party", on Thursday and accused him of arresting the probe into the truth about the criminal acts by the Intelligence Service (IS), according to KBS of south Korea.
					 They said that the state investigation into the IS's interference in the election has not been made.
					
					 This is because Kim Jin Thae and other members of the "Saenuri Party" are denying the illegality of the case and patronizing the police act of underreporting the results of investigation to impede the investigation, they charged.

articles.title: Massive Candlelight Actions Likely in S. Korea
articles.content:
Massive Candlelight Actions Likely in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation in south Korea called on people of all social standings to come out in large-scale candlelight actions to protest the puppet Intelligence Service's (IS) interference in the election, according to CBS of south Korea. The organization held a press conference on Thursday.
					 It said that candlelight actions will be staged in Kwangju and three other places on Friday and in Pusan and four other places on Saturday. It called for 100,000-strong actions.

articles.title: Data Proving Sexual Slavery by Japan Made Public
articles.content:
Data Proving Sexual Slavery by Japan Made Public
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Data disclosing hair-raising sexual slavery committed in an organized way by the Japanese imperialists under the state sponsorship were made public on Tuesday.
					 It was revealed by a diary of a Korean who worked at a "comfort station" run by the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 According to it, the Japanese command for dispatch of troops to the southern region requested the command of the Japanese troops in Korea to cooperate with the recruitment of "comfort women" in May 1942.
					
					 The command in Korea mobilized contractors to allure women with honeyed words of earning lots of money and walk them away to battle fields for aggression through Pusan Port on several occasions and forced them into sexual slavery.
					
					 The diary said that "comfort stations" by the Imperial Japanese Army were operated under its strict control.
					
					 The "comfort stations" in different parts regularly submitted "report on income" and "daily report on operation" to units to which they are affiliated, and the funds for their operation were borne by the army. The relocation of "comfort stations" was done on the orders from the Japanese military.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists even forced ex-comfort women to provide sex to the Japanese troops under the pretext of logistics.
					
					 These facts prove the absurdity of the recent remarks made by the Japanese rightist elements that there is no evidence proving that the Japanese army directly assaulted and threatened women and walked them away to force them into sexual slavery.
					
					 An Pyong Jik, honorary professor at Seoul National University, said that the sexual slavery by the Imperial Japanese Army was sponsored by the state as part of the wartime mobilization system like labor drafting, conscription and "voluntary labor corps", adding it was a forced mobilization in its nature.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Kimjongilia show, Korean book and photo exhibition and film show took place in the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka, Russia, on July 26. They were to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed in the venues were photos documenting the exploits by President Kim Il Sung in winning the war and the feats by leader Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un in their Songun leadership.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and photos of the heroic service personnel and people of the DPRK during the war.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid respects.
					
					 The mayor of Nakhodka City voiced his expectation that the friendly bonds and the creative cooperation between the peoples of the two countries would make contributions to defending peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The first vice president of the Nakhodka City Assembly said the victory of the Korean people in the war was a great victory of the independent people and a historic event which demonstrated that no one could match the army and people, united close around the leader.
					
					 The secretary of the Political Council of the Nakhodka City Branch of the Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party said Korean- style socialism is victoriously advancing despite storm and stress as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation noted that the Fatherland Liberation War was a righteous struggle of the Korean people as well as the process in which the Korean people displayed loyalty to their leader and the ardent love for the country.
					
					 He expressed his conviction that the Workers' Party of Korea would victoriously lead the struggle of the Korean people to build a thriving nation and reunify the country, upholding Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Peruvian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Peruvian Website
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on its website on August 4.
					 The work, made public on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks and ways to reunify the country based on them.

articles.title: Figures of Brazil, Russia Give Impressions of DPRK
articles.content:
Figures of Brazil, Russia Give Impressions of DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Figures of Brazil and Russia gave impressions of the DPRK on August 1 after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Borges Rodriguez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, said in his travelogue to the DPRK on its website:
					
					 I took part in the July 27 celebrations in the DPRK and was deeply moved to find the Korean people as a high civilized and proud nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, is successfully carrying forward the principle of defending the sovereignty of the nation. This principle was firmly adhered by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who founded and led the WPK.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to suffocate the DPRK's economy.
					
					 The DPRK is practically pursuing the policy for the people
					
					 Many modern apartment houses have been built in Pyongyang and the traffic in the city is impeccable. 
					
					 The heroic Korean people are dynamically advancing, undaunted. 
					
					 The military parade, cheerful masses and the disciplined Korean People's Army with modern arms and equipment left unforgettable impression to me.
					
					 Yuri Shkurenkov who visited the DPRK as the head of the delegation of Russian war veterans in Amur Region, in an interview with a news agency said: The military parade was very wonderful and see-worthy. The most stirring moment was when I was awarded the Order of the 60th Anniversary of the Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Club de Equitacion de Mirim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Club de Equitacion de Mirim
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el campo de construccion del Club de Equitacion de Mirim.
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el diseno general del club, el Mariscal se entero en detalles de la marcha de la construccion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares hayan hecho muchos trabajos en un corto tiempo poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario y superando las dificultades.
					
					Dijo que si se construye el club, los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares poseeran el espiritu sano y la fortaleza fisica practicando la equitacion, con los cuales contribuiran al trabajo y la defensa nacional.
					
					Presento las siguientes tareas para acondicionar el club de talla mundial:
					
					Hay que construir bien la sala de conservacion de reliquias que transmiten las hazanas de direccion del Dirigente y edificar con excelencia el campo de entrenamiento de equitacion bajo techo, la escuela concerniente, los edificios de servicio publico y otros.
					
					Es necesario levantar un moderno establecimiento de restablecimiento funcional que permite quitar la fatiga por la equitacion.
					
					Para criar e incrementar el numero de caballos, hay que construir el hospital de veterinaria y el instituto de reproduccion.
					
					Impulsando la construccion del club hay que tomar previamente las medidas para su administracion.
					
					Para el fin, es necesario fijar correctamente la unidad de administracion de club de equitacion, organizar la asociacion de equitacion y enviar los medios de transporte, maquinas de corte de cesped, camion cisterna, etc.
					
					Al final, el Mariscal expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores militares y los funcionarios de la rama concluiran la obra hasta el 68o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Ma Won Chun y Kim Su Gil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el campo de construccion del Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu.
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano del complejo, el estuvo en varios puntos.
					
					En la piscina bajo techo vio atentamente el salon de entrada y dio la indicacion de levantar bien ahi una estatua de pie del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					La conclusion de esta obra significaria el cumplimiento del legado del Dirigente quien se proponia construir un complejo de piscinas para nuestro pueblo, dijo y agrego en tono emocionante que bueno seria si lo hubieramos construido y demostrado a el cuando estaba vivo.
					
					Se mostro complacido de que hayan completado el techo en forma de ball truss en lo conveniente a las caracteristicas de esta piscina polivalente y lo hayan tratado con vidrio para el buen soleamiento.
					
					En el segundo piso disfruto el panorama de la piscina al aire libre con ultramodernos estanques y dijo que seria maravilloso cuando se instalen hasta modernos equipos de diversiones en el agua.
					
					Sobre el tejado de la piscina bajo techo, se acondicionaran las canchas de voleibol, badminton y baloncesto y en los alrededores de la otra al aire libre, el patinadero de ruedas y la cancha de voleibol de playa, dijo y asevero que asi el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu sera de verdad un establecimiento deportivo polivalente.
					
					Me pongo alegre desde ya al imaginar en el mar de personas como habitantes, jovenes y ninos escolares divirtiendose en este complejo, apunto.
					
					Evaluo el hecho de que la construccion marcha en el principio de ahorrar al maximo el consumo de electricidad con las medidas de uso de energia geotermica.
					
					Instruyo plantar los arboles de buenas especies en el contorno de la piscina al aire libre y crear mucho mas areas de cesped.
					
					Asevero que es la decision y voluntad del PTC terminar hasta el dia de fundacion de esta organizacion la construccion de este complejo en el nivel mundial y ofrecerlo al pueblo.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores militares apoyaran el proposito del PTC con practicas revolucionarias al terminar incondicionalmente la obra en el plazo fijado.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Ma Won Chun y Kim Su Gil.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Chad
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Chad
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Chad, Idriss Deby Itno, con motivo del 53o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano.
					En su mensaje, el remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo exitos en las labores para la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais y expresa la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae averigua estado de construccion de campo de esqui
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae averigua estado de construccion de campo de esqui
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae averiguo en el terreno el estado de construccion del campo de esqui del monte Masik
					En pleno acato al historico llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC, los constructores militares terminaron en  un corto plazo el apisonamiento de la pista de esqui ya abierta y el montaje de armazon de diversos edificios, entre otras hotel y edificios de servicio con la "velocidad de Masikryong", nueva velocidad de ataque del siglo 21 de los combatientes capaces de aniquilar uno contra cien enemigos.
					
					En varios puntos del campo de construccion, Choe hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de la marcha general de la obra y estimulo a los constructores militares quienes abrieron la perspectiva de acabarla dentro este ano.
					
					Recordo que al presentar iniciativa de la construccion del campo de esqui de talla mundial, el Mariscal dio esta tarea al EPC y se refirio a la necesidad de seguir el impetu de la ofensiva general por la construccion de la potencia economica y de un pais civilizado socialista.
					
					Destaco que al anteponer a la obra el transporte de cemento, materiales de acero, arena y gravilla, debe terminar lo mas pronto posible la construccion de la casa de descanso aplicando los racionales metodos de construccion.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno fueron debatidas las medidas para realizar de modo tridimensional la obra segun procesos y organizadas las labores correspondientes.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang la delegacion gubernamental de RPDC para gira por paises africanos
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang la delegacion gubernamental de RPDC para gira por paises africanos
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Salio el dia 10 de esta capital la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Pak Ui Chun, para realizar una gira por los paises africanos.
